name: v0.15.0
body:
## Using [Bzlmod] with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_esbuild", version = "0.15.0")
```

[Bzlmod]: https://bazel.build/build/bzlmod

## Using WORKSPACE

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_esbuild",
    sha256 = "098e38e5ee868c14a6484ba263b79e57d48afacfc361ba30137c757a9c4716d6",
    strip_prefix = "rules_esbuild-0.15.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/releases/download/v0.15.0/rules_esbuild-v0.15.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_esbuild setup #
######################

# Fetches the rules_esbuild dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_esbuild//esbuild:dependencies.bzl", "rules_esbuild_dependencies")

rules_esbuild_dependencies()

# If you didn't already register a toolchain providing nodejs, do that:
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

# Register a toolchain containing esbuild npm package and native bindings
load("@aspect_rules_esbuild//esbuild:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_ESBUILD_VERSION", "esbuild_register_toolchains")

esbuild_register_toolchains(
    name = "esbuild",
    esbuild_version = LATEST_ESBUILD_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: fix link esbuild macro docstring by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/142
* test: add esbuild(define) tests by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/144
* fix: support format option when not splitting by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/147
* fix: rename LATEST_VERSION to LATEST_ESBUILD_VERSION by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/148
* chore: add esbuild 0.17.18 by @brendean in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/149
* fix: set explicit tsconfig to prevent use of esbuild default by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/151
* ci: enable buildifier check on ci by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/152
* chore: fix buildifier issues  by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/153
* ci: disable buildifier check on windows by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/154
* chore: bump rules_js dep to 1.29.2 to pickup Windows fix by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/156

## New Contributors
* @brendean made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/149

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/compare/v0.14.4...v0.15.0

name: v0.14.4
body:
## Using [Bzlmod] with Bazel 6:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_esbuild", version = "0.14.4")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

```starlark

    name = "aspect_rules_esbuild",
    sha256 = "2ea31bd97181a315e048be693ddc2815fddda0f3a12ca7b7cc6e91e80f31bac7",

# If you didn't already register a toolchain providing nodejs, do that:

    name = "node",

# Register a toolchain containing esbuild npm package and native bindings
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/compare/v0.14.3...v0.14.4

## What's Changed

* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.2.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/134

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/compare/v0.14.1...v0.14.2

name: v0.14.1
body:
## Using WORKSPACE

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_esbuild",
    sha256 = "c78d38d6ec2e7497dde4f8d67f49c71614daf11e2bbe276e23f5b09a89801677",
    strip_prefix = "rules_esbuild-0.14.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/releases/download/v0.14.1/rules_esbuild-v0.14.1.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_esbuild setup #
######################

# Fetches the rules_esbuild dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_esbuild//esbuild:dependencies.bzl", "rules_esbuild_dependencies")

rules_esbuild_dependencies()

# If you didn't already register a toolchain providing nodejs, do that:
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

# Register a toolchain containing esbuild npm package and native bindings
load("@aspect_rules_esbuild//esbuild:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_VERSION", "esbuild_register_toolchains")

esbuild_register_toolchains(
    name = "esbuild",
    esbuild_version = LATEST_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update to rules_js 1.17.0 and aspect_bazel_lib 1.24.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/119
* chore: Add the macOS runner to the matrix strategy by @realtimetodie in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/118
* refactor: move resolved_toolchain to the main workspace by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/122
* chore: only run macOS CI on landed commits with Bazel 6 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/126
* fix: API Documentation link gives 404 on GitHub by @pattrickrice in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/127
* release: publish release artifact by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/128
* chore: add esbuild 0.17.4 by @dpoluyanov in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/117
* chore: update to rules_js 1.19.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/129
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.27.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/130
* chore: add esbuild 0.17.10 by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/131
* chore: add .DS_Store to .gitignore by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/132

## New Contributors
* @realtimetodie made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/118
* @pattrickrice made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/127
* @dpoluyanov made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/117

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/compare/v0.14.0...v0.14.1

* chore: update to rules_js 1.6.8 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/96
* fix: allow generating no sourcemaps by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/93
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.16.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/99


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/compare/v0.13.1...v0.13.2

name: v0.13.1
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_esbuild",
    sha256 = "dccab34d457faf9968ec83e2900d65cf5b846f036822b675d988deee0113dba9",
    strip_prefix = "rules_esbuild-0.13.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/archive/refs/tags/v0.13.1.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_esbuild setup #
######################

# Fetches the rules_esbuild dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_esbuild//esbuild:dependencies.bzl", "rules_esbuild_dependencies")

rules_esbuild_dependencies()

# If you didn't already register a toolchain providing nodejs, do that:
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

# Register a toolchain containing esbuild npm package and native bindings
load("@aspect_rules_esbuild//esbuild:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_VERSION", "esbuild_register_toolchains")

esbuild_register_toolchains(
    name = "esbuild",
    esbuild_version = LATEST_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.16.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/90
* chore: update to Bazel 6.0.0rc1 and test against both 6.0.0rc1 and 5.3.2 on CI by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/91
* chore: update to rules_js 1.6.6 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/92


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/compare/v0.13.0...v0.13.1

name: v0.12.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_esbuild",
    sha256 = "1e365451341ffb2490193292dfd9953f2ca009586c2381cb4dc08d01e48866b7",
    strip_prefix = "rules_esbuild-0.12.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/archive/refs/tags/v0.12.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_esbuild setup #
######################

# Fetches the rules_esbuild dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_esbuild//esbuild:dependencies.bzl", "rules_esbuild_dependencies")

rules_esbuild_dependencies()

# If you didn't already register a toolchain providing nodejs, do that:
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

# Register a toolchain containing esbuild npm package and native bindings
load("@aspect_rules_esbuild//esbuild:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_VERSION", "esbuild_register_toolchains")

esbuild_register_toolchains(
    name = "esbuild",
    esbuild_version = LATEST_VERSION,
)
```

[rules_js 1.1.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/tag/v1.1.0) is required for this release.

## What's Changed
* chore: update to rules_js 1.1.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/61


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/compare/v0.11.1...v0.12.0

## What's Changed
* Support esbuild 0.14.51 by @arobinson in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/49
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_nodejs to v5.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/52
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.26.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/53
* chore(deps): update build_bazel_integration_testing digest to 7d3e9ae by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/50
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_stardoc to v0.5.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/51
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.34.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/55
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/54
* chore: update to rules_js 1.0.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/56
* fix: don't preserve symlinks so we can resolve npm deps in the symlinked node_modules tree by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/57
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/60

## New Contributors
* @arobinson made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/49

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/compare/v0.11.0...v0.11.1

```starlark
    sha256 = "e2805ce27bbe664381dee614634a540715299010001f5cbc343b26d88a7b3b76",
    strip_prefix = "rules_esbuild-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/archive/refs/tags/v0.5.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_esbuild setup #
######################

# Fetches the rules_esbuild dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_esbuild//esbuild:dependencies.bzl", "rules_esbuild_dependencies")

rules_esbuild_dependencies()

# If you didn't already register a toolchain providing nodejs, do that:
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

# Register a toolchain containing esbuild npm package and native bindings
load("@aspect_rules_esbuild//esbuild:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_VERSION", "esbuild_register_toolchains")

esbuild_register_toolchains(
    name = "esbuild",
    esbuild_version = LATEST_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update to rules_js 0.9.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/18
* fix: copy config file to bin, so users don't have to by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/19
* chore: update to rules_js 0.10.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/20

## New Contributors
* @gregmagolan made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/18

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

## What's Changed
* Add e2e asserting rules setup works for users by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/12
* Add LATEST_VERSION like swc and terser have by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/13
* update rules_js by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/14


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_esbuild",
    sha256 = "62e4833b2a06966c79ef8bc0ae0776a4b46ffb925cadf03e800bec0d15212c07",
    strip_prefix = "rules_esbuild-0.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/archive/refs/tags/v0.2.0.tar.gz",
)

# Fetches the rules_esbuild dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@aspect_rules_esbuild//esbuild:dependencies.bzl", "rules_esbuild_dependencies")
rules_esbuild_dependencies()

# If you didn't already register a toolchain providing nodejs, do that:
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node16",
    node_version = "16.9.0",
)

# Register a toolchain containing esbuild npm package and native bindings
load("@aspect_rules_esbuild//esbuild:repositories.bzl", "esbuild_register_toolchains")

esbuild_register_toolchains(
    name = "esbuild14",
    esbuild_version = "0.14.36",
)

```


## What's Changed
* chore: remove spurious bzl_library targets by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/5
* chore: better messaging when user chooses a version we don't have by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/6
* chore: update bazel-lib and rules_js by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/7
* chore: rename example to examples as we will have more by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/8
* config attribute supports dict by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/4
* Add example based on esbuild's css example by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/10
* Adopt new pnpm-based rules_js by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/11


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

## What's Changed
* Initial port of esbuild rule by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/1
* Add a newer version by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/pull/3

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_esbuild/commits/v0.1.0
